name: ORCHID HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I checked out of ths hotel a few days ago and I have to say this is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. The hotel was dirty, the bed linen stained and the rooms smelt. The staff were very friendly and did their best to help but even as a budget hotel this is a backpackers hostel at best.
reviews.title: Did I stay in the wrong room?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I just do not understand how it is getting such good reviews because we were told we had the best room in the hotel.
reviews.title: You'll not find better in Vietnam without paying crazy money.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Is there a better place to stay in Vietnam or the whole of Asia I dought it very much.
reviews.title: Good value, clean hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wonderful staff (even gave us a honeymoon cake) nothing is ever too much for them in their quest to provide very special customer care.
reviews.title: Orchid Hotel Hue

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great comfortable rooms with fresh fruit supplied everyday.
reviews.title: Very friendly and welcoming hotel

reviews.text: We stayed here for two nights, in two rooms - a family room plus a superior room. The family room was lovely - spacious, with a small balcony, computer in the room, good toiletries plus nice touches such as the animal towels, satin covers on the complimentary water bottles and complimentary fruit. The standard room had much the same facilities, however obviously smaller, but the main negative was the solid brick wall about 20 cm from the window! It wasn't a big deal as we didn't spend much time in the room, but we realised after the first night that the space between the wall and the window actually goes down to the breakfast room - so if you have your window open, a lot of noise travels upwards very early in the morning. The other negative was that although we booked some time ago in a single booking, we were given rooms on floors 2 and 5. Being a family with young children, rooms on the same floor would have been preferable.
reviews.title: Extremely Friendly Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A major plus for this hotel is it's friendly staff, they were probably the most friendly and helpful we encountered anywhere. They made a huge fuss over our children, and even gave them gifts on our arrival.
reviews.title: Room without a view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel arranged a city tour for us and a van to drive us over the Hai Van Pass to Hoi An. We also had laundry done by the hotel which was done efficiently and not too expensive.
reviews.title: Good location, good value and service with smiles

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a long walk to the Citadel, but doable if it's not too hot (as it was when we were there). But there are plenty of good places to eat very close by so the location is fine.
reviews.title: Friendly hotel experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, the hotel is clean and comfortable with great staff, and it was the best value for money of any hotel we stayed at in Vietnam.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights in this great little hotel. As many people come to Hue on the overnight train from Hanoi, the hotel will pick you up at the train station. We were upgraded to the Honeymoon suite, on the top floor, with views of the city. The bed was very comfortable, and everything throughout the hotel is very clean. Hotel staff will solve every request and problem. They arranged bicycles so we could ride to the pagoda. When we returned, we were hot and tired, but still hoped to visit at least a few of the royal tombs. The receptionist gave us time to shower, and arranged a driver to come and pick us up and take us to three of the tombs, even though it was later in the day. Thank you! We walked to the Citadel, but you could easily take a taxi. Location was very good, as we found very good places to have an afternoon drink and excellent restuarants nearby. We opted to go to Hoi An with a driver and car from the hotel, and it was a very good experience. Our driver, Trai, spoke English well and showed us many things along the way that we would have never seen otherwise. This trip was also good value, as was everything about Hotel Orchid. Well managed, and lovely staff!
reviews.title: Value, Service and Location

reviews.text: This was a great choice. Convenient location, great service, good price and value. It rained the whole time we were in Hue, but coming from the aggressive sellers and many tourists in Hoi An, it was nice to walk around in the more chill big city atmosphere. The Orchid Hotel provided a cab pick up from the train station and let us store our luggage all day. If I had to mention a negative, I would say that the fruit at breakfast was a little old (not the freshest), but hey, at least the meal was included in the price.
reviews.title: Really can't say much bad about this hotel
The best staff ever
reviews.text: My stay in Hue became several weeks when my husband was taken seriously ill. The staff at the hotel were utterly exceptional and I cannot thank them enough for the help they gave me and my family - coming to the hospital daily, providing food and bedding, cooking special soups for the patient. These were exceptional people who did this out of the goodness of their hearts.
Our room was light and airy and the hotel is in a good location. But as many others have said, the staff are fantastic and I had particular reason to thank them. Do go there!
reviews.title: Best By Far
Recomend
reviews.text: I got to the hotel at 10:30am knowing that checking was not till had planed to drop my bags and see the city and check in after 2:00pm as i only have one day in Hue. Was meet on the street by as lovely man from the hotel who picked up my bag and carried it up the stairs to the lobby was greated by all the staff in the loddy as soon as i steped in the door was ask for my booking info and passport like most hotels i was then ask to come in to the dinning room for welcome drink as the girls on front desk checked me in. Then they can in to me and let me know that i had been given a up grade at no charge as the room i booked was not checked out yet. the staff member doing my checking in then gave me a map of Hue and showed me where and witch way i should go to get to where i wanted to go. I could have not ask for more the room is lovely, clean and the saff are more then happy to help with what ever you need.

This hotel has everything you could ask for. The staff are very helpful; I had made a mistake with my booking and they went out of their way to sort this out. The rooms are very clean with great attention to detail. They also arranged a one day private tour for us which was excellent. A great find and a reasonable price.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel and service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed here in November 2010 and April 2012 and we loved it both times. Everyone is as helpful as can be and very friendly. The rooms are good sized with quality furnishings including a PC. The breakfast buffet has good variety plus they cook to order. We had them arrange a driver for a morning to explore the Tombs (Trai was very helpful driver) and also a driver to Hoi An, and the vehicles and drivers were excellent. A cheerful and whimsical touch is the way they shape the towels into animals. Very cute! The location is good, too - on a quiet street a short walk from the river.
reviews.title: Excellent experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This small very personal hotel has very high standards, good beds and linens, is extremely clean with many extras which you would not expect to find in this price range. Breakfast was excellent, as was the coffee! It is perfectly located, a reasonable taxi ride to the Imperial City, and restaurants abound in the square block where the hotel is situated. We stayed three nights and had no complaint of any kind, in fact hated to leave. It has big hotel comforts with small hotel congeniality.
reviews.title: Great Value in All Respects

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Do not hesitate to select this hotel for your stay in Hue.
reviews.title: Great hotel, perfect location, wonderful staff

reviews.text: This was our first time in Vietnam, and we were made to feel extremely welcome at the Orchid Hotel.
reviews.title: So surprised

description: The Orchid Hotel in Hue is a new 'boutique' style hotel with 5 star rooms and amenities that one would not expect to see in a hotel of this class, coupled with well presented, friendly staff and excellent value for money the Orchid very much lives up to its corporate slogan, ''Always Most Pleasure''.
